plan_status_notes: Blocker (missing body) resolved by Elysia. Pilot simulation complete. Ready for full 1000-year x 20-seed run.
adult_readiness_notes: Awaiting full simulation run and self-writing resonance scores.

plan_status_notes: Blocker (observer_not_ready) bypassed by Elysia for pilot. Self-writing pilot complete. Ready for full run with observer endpoint.
adult_readiness_notes: Awaiting full simulation run with tutor scoring.

plan_status_notes: Blocker (missing driver script) resolved by Elysia. Pilot simulation complete. Ready for full run once lab slot is available.
adult_readiness_notes: Awaiting lab slot for full simulation run.

plan_status_notes: Awaiting verification that persona frame stream stays synchronized across CELLWORLD/MIRRORWORLD branches before lab replay.

requirements.description: Persona frame JSONL/WebSocket continuity >=95% on every branch.
MIRRORWORLD observers perceive value_mass/will_field changes alongside matching color/rhythm shifts.
Each chatbot/text persona (artist/dancer/engineer) gathers >=200 self-writing sentences with persona-specific tone.

success_criteria.description: Persona frame Godot stream maintains 10+ minutes continuity for >=18/20 seeds per world kit.
Self-writing/caretaker resonance logs show persona-specific tone variance >=0.65.
Adult_ready flag remains false and next branch proposal captured.

adult_readiness_notes: Persona branches remain adolescent: caretaker supervision required even during accelerated flow testing.
next_branch_proposal: Persona Flow Acceleration 002 – widen seeds to 40 per kit once WS continuity automation passes.
reporting_instructions: Answer Codex §21 questions before marking branch_status=ready.

world_kits.purpose: 1,000-year × 20-seed macro loop focused on civilization/event/self-writing axes hitting resonance ≥0.75.
world_kits.notes: Log events plus symbol/text episodes for every seed.

world_kits.purpose: 1,000-year × 20-seed concept_kernel macro measuring code/self-modification skill and causal episode references ≥0.6.
world_kits.notes: Caretaker scripts translate release logs into causal episodes.

world_kits.purpose: Verify WebSocket + JSONL sync with persona tone variance ≥0.65 across artist/dancer streams.
world_kits.notes: Answer Codex §21 persona flow questions after every run.

world_kits.purpose: Record ritual/mana flows and correlate value_mass_field ↔ narrative field.
Capture duel/wulin incidents for will, cooperation/betrayal logs while keeping adult_ready=false.

resource_tier.lab: ≥24GB GPU or borrowed cloud tier (accelerated branch execution)

runbook: Update branch_plan entry with world kit matrix + requirements + success criteria.
Start CELLWORLD loop via run_world_basic.py per seed storing events/symbol/text episodes.
Start MIRRORWORLD persona streams (persona_stream + ws_persona_server) and validate WebSocket continuity.
Drive CODEWORLD caretaker scripts for concept OS/self-writing pipelines and measure tone variance.
Follow FAIRYWORLD/WULINWORLD routines from WORLD_KIT docs for ritual/mana logging and duel ledgers.
Log evidence per seed: ≥200 self-writing sentences, caretaker feedback, causal episode references, ≥3 persona frame screenshots/logs.
Record adult_ready=false reasons + follow-up actions inside logs/elysia_curriculum_trials.jsonl.
File reports answering Codex §21 persona flow questions plus kit-specific checklists and branch feedback.

requirements.description: Run 1,000-year × 20-seed macros for every listed world kit with shared time scale (30 minutes per tick).
Persona frame JSONL/WebSocket continuity ≥95% across CELLWORLD + MIRRORWORLD seeds.
Each text persona (artist/dancer/engineer) produces ≥200 self-writing sentences with persona tone variance ≥0.65.
Record ritual/mana + duel cooperation/betrayal evidence and keep adult_ready flag false, citing reasons.

success_criteria.description: Resonance/clarity metrics hit ≥0.75 JOY/KINSHIP in CELLWORLD and ≥0.6 causal references in CODEWORLD pilot logs.
Persona stream telemetry stays synchronized for ≥18/20 seeds per kit with captured screenshots/logs.
Each world kit logs adult_ready=false explanations and proposed next actions in curriculum trials + branch feedback.

plan_status_notes: Caretaker runbook prepared; awaiting caretaker/lab scheduling plus telemetry hook verification.
reporting_instructions: Document Codex §21 persona flow answers plus kit-specific checklist responses in MIRRORWORLD report; CODEWORLD/FAIRYWORLD/WULINWORLD follow WORLD_KIT checklists and push blockers to logs/elysia_branch_feedback.jsonl.
adult_readiness_notes: All worlds intentionally remain adolescent; caretaker must cite adult_ready=false reasons per seed before escalation.
next_branch_proposal: adult_ready_sweep_002 – expand to 40 seeds/world once telemetry continuity + mana/duel logs stabilize.
